profile.headline: Building at the intersection of AI and growth.
profile.bio:
With 20 years spanning business development, strategic partnerships, and go-to-market leadership, I've had the privilege of driving transformative revenue growth at the world's largest cloud company.

As Global Business Development Lead for Agentic AI and SAP Business Data Cloud at Amazon Web Services, I architect partnerships with enterprise technology leaders like SAP and Databricks — deals that have collectively driven over $1 billion in annual recurring revenue.

Currently completing my Executive MBA at Columbia Business School, I write about what the AI revolution means for revenue leaders, sales organizations, and the future of B2B growth.

experience.title: Global Business Development Lead, Agentic AI
experience.description:
• Defined and own AWS's global revenue and partnership strategy for Agentic AI and SAP Business Data Cloud (BDC) with SAP — building an entirely new business line at the intersection of enterprise ERP and AI.
• Structured Partnership strategy with SAP and ISV Partners (Databricks and Snowflake) that created multi-hundred-million-dollar ARR revenue streams
• Launched AWS SAP AI Co-innovation Program with SAP to help customers to accelerate innovation with SAP Business AI
• Architected global co-innovation roadmaps and CxO alignment frameworks with SAP and AWS executive leadership, positioning AWS as the default enterprise cloud platform for AI-enabled digital transformation.
• Built cross-functional GTM engine spanning sales, product, engineering, and marketing across four regions, creating a repeatable model for scaling AI partnership revenue.
• Drove executive alignment between AWS and SAP C-suites to accelerate product roadmap integration and joint go-to-market execution across Fortune 500 accounts.

experience.title: Global Business Development, SAP on AWS
experience.description:
• Delivered 45% compound annual revenue growth in the SAP on AWS business across North and Latin America, scaling the business from early enterprise adoption to a multi-hundred-million-dollar recurring revenue platform.
• Negotiated and closed the SAP ERP Private Cloud collaboration — AWS’s largest SAP partnership deal, securing AWS as the preferred cloud service provider for SAP’s enterprise workloads.
• Designed and rolled out sales enablement programs for 750+ AWS account managers, embedding enterprise-selling playbooks and CxO engagement frameworks that became the standard across the Americas region.
• Built and managed specialist sales teams (SAP, Oracle, and BD leads) across multiple geographies, establishing the cross-functional operating rhythm across sales, engineering, marketing, legal, and PR that scaled AWS’s enterprise workload business.

experience.title: Associate Director, SAP S/4HANA Business Transformation
experience.description:
• Directed global GTM strategy for SAP S/4HANA and Cloud products, securing major transformation contracts and driving $150M in incremental annual revenue for Infosys’s digital consulting practice.
• Built the SAP S/4HANA implementation and consulting offering from concept to $500M revenue contribution within three years, establishing Infosys as a market leader in SAP modernization.
• Created the M&A Consulting Center of Excellence (COE) — a net-new practice delivering prescriptive post-merger technology integration services that generated $100M in annual recurring consulting revenue.
• Led the post-acquisition GTM integration of Panaya into Infosys’s SAP portfolio, designing joint value propositions that combined Infosys’s consulting capabilities with Panaya’s AI-powered automation platform to unlock $68M ARR in new migration services.
• Negotiated co-innovation partnerships with SAP, Broadcom ($80M ARR co-development program), and UiPath to build differentiated joint offerings and recurring revenue streams.
• Managed cross-regional consulting teams across North America, LATAM, and EMEA, building scalable delivery capabilities while hiring, mentoring, and developing next-generation consulting leaders.

experience.title: Consultant --> Principal Consultant: Business Process & ERP Tranformation
experience.description:
• Progressive eight-year career spanning four promotions, delivering enterprise ERP transformation programs for Fortune 500 clients across North America, LATAM, EMEA, and APAC.
• Directed large-scale SAP ERP rollouts across Latin America (Colombia, Peru, Argentina, Chile, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, Bolivia) and the U.S., standardizing operations for multinational enterprises.
• Led a global financial consolidation program for a Fortune 500 CPG client, enhancing reporting accuracy and significantly reducing finance overhead.
• Built Application Portfolio Rationalization (APR) frameworks that harmonized business processes across multinational operations, lowering total cost of ownership and improving supply chain performance.
• Coordinated multi-vendor delivery teams (Infosys, SAP, HP, Deloitte) across regions, reducing governance overhead and establishing delivery best practices adopted organization-wide.
• Founded the Testing Center of Excellence for enterprise ERP rollouts, improving quality and reducing go-live risk across Infosys’s global delivery portfolio.

experience.title: Early Career — Software Engineering & Product Development
experience.company: Patni Computers, ABB, and Tube Products of India
experience.description:
• Foundational career in manufacturing, supply chain, and enterprise technology across SAP ERP implementations (SD, WM, MM, PP modules) for global enterprises including Weyerhaeuser and ABB Global Services.
• Built technical depth in SAP solution design, blueprinting, and go-live execution within global delivery models — the operational foundation that underpins my enterprise technology leadership career.
